name: Maze Game (itch) (Detoxified)
description: Waste your time playing a game with absolutely no audio and not so "fun" experience. Find the exit ( and by that I mean the only way out is death), go to different levels( only 3 levels available) and find your experience a hellish one! And guess what? You can't even press the Quit button at the end so you will have to manually press Alt+F4... sounds more like a you problem
